name: Agave Dry Heat Protection & Hold Styling Mist
categories: Hair, Hair Styling & Treatments, Hair Styling Products
about: What it is: A styling mist for dry hair that provides heat protection and controls frizz for shiny, soft hair...Hair Type: Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily..Hair Texture: Fine, Medium, and Thick..Hair Concerns:.- Frizz.- Heat Protection.- Hold..Key Benefits:.- Provides heat protection up to 450 degrees.- Help with frizz control.- Creates an all-day, flexible hold..Highlighted Ingredients:.- Moringa Leaf Extract: Repairs damage and prevents breakage..- Prickly Pear Seed Oil: Hydrates and nourishes hair to soften and add shine..- Agave Leaf Extract: Promotes strength, resilience, and elasticity...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Mist this multitasking styling mist before you use your hot tool for heat protection, hold, frizz control, and smoothness. It's infused with desert-derived botanicals like agave, prickly pear, and cactus floweru2014for healthy, shiny styles that last...Fragrance Description: This styling mist has a sweet, warm, and citrusy scent....
ingredients: -Moringa Leaf Extract: Repairs damage and prevents breakage..-Prickly Pear Seed Oil: Hydrates and nourishes hair to soften and add shine..-Agave Leaf Extract: Promotes strength, resilience, and elasticity...Water/Aqua, Glycerin, Sodium Polyitaconate, Polysorbate 20, Propanediol, Phenoxyethanol, Dimethicone, Fragrance, Limonene, Ethylhexylglycerin, Opuntia Ficus-Indica Seed Oil, Carthamus Tinctorius (Safflower) Seed Oil, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Squalane, Eclipta Prostrata Extract, Agave Tequilana Leaf Extract, Citrus Aurantium Dulcis (Orange) Peel Oil, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata Seed Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Linalool, Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Extract, Ocimum Basilicum (Basil) Flower/Leaf Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Moringa Oleifera Seed Oil, Benzyl Alcohol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Tocopheryl Acetate......The list of ingredients is subject to change, please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Section hair, mist, style, and repeat. .-Use on DRY HAIR ONLY. Shake well. .-Mist hair evenly one section at a time, then style with hot tool. .-Repeat steps with each section of hair.

reviews.review_text: I just bought this product and so far it's going well. It's not that bad, but just a little bothersome. The scent sort of disappears after around 30 minutes to an hour, which is not a problem for me personally! After using heat tools I would reccomwnt using so sort of styling oil (i used the gisou) and it will work against the stickiness. My only complaint is that the product leaves my hair feeling just a little dry and textured, and less soft than it usually it's.

reviews.review_title: Good for fine hair, smells like orange creamsicle!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine hair. I use this product on the top of my head, above eye level, because it is so lightweight. I used to not use a heat protectant up higher because they always weighed my hair down and made it appear greasy, but this does not do that! This also curbs flyaways better than anything I have ever used between bumble & bumble, olaplaex, redken, pureology, verb, etc. I still use a more heavy-duty heat protectant on the lower portion of my hair, but this has helped with those little details, especially flyaways. And the smell!!! It's orange creamsicle, a very fresh orange-vanilla scent, not too sickly sweet. I would buy a fragrance like this. I wish the scent lingered longer, it seems to dissipate fairly quickly.  Also I LOVE that this is packaged in a bottle - not an aerosol can - yet still produces a fine mist to evenly distribute across the hair. I find it irritating when I have to travel on a plane, and my aerosol can products go flat due to the changes in pressure and are no longer usable. Very happy that this is travel friendly!

reviews.review_text: This was recommended as a heat protectant to spray on dry hair before using a flat/curling iron and to hold the style as well. It's just as effective and not quite up there with other similar products. Pretty good tho!

reviews.review_text: I use this product to tame my flyaways and also as a hold styling mist. It works wonderfully, and smells delicious as well.

reviews.review_text: The product smells great. There wasn't any hold. reviews.review_title: Great product for a specific need
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I really like this heat protection spray because of the hold it provides. I like to use a thermal brush or curling wand on my hair before work, and in the morning when every extra minute counts, it's really convenient to have a product that offers heat protection + hold in one. Using this, my hair stays basically styled all day, and still looks pretty good 2-3 days later. It also smells great (it's like a sweet, sugary, citrus smell - really fresh and sparkling). The mist comes out super fine which I like because I feel like it coats my hair evenly without getting it too damp.  My only quibble with this is that it leaves my hair ever so slightly sticky feeling, like any hold hair spray. But that's what this is for. If that bothers you, I would try a different product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: love this product sooo much !! a little bit expensive for a heat protectant, but i can understand. the reason i'm giving it 4/5 stars is because it doesn't give you that shine that the photos show. kinda  misleading.

reviews.review_title: Took me forever to notice it was bad
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: My heart belongs to the bondi boost thermal spray, but since it appears like it will never be restocked, I bought this to hold me over.  I love the dae hair oil and the packaging for this spray is really pretty and for those reasons I overlooked the fact that it was slowly frying my hair. Near the end of the first bottle my hair was getting damaged and dry and breaking off in sections. I thought it was my heat tools until one day I skipped the spray before I used them and my hair was instantly happy and silky and holding style again. Tragically, I bought a second bottle before I realized the spray was doing the opposite of what it was supposed to.  I'm tempted to give 2 stars just because I think the packaging is really nice and stretches out the product a ton, but since the product itself isn't good I guess this isn't a plus. Sephora please restock the  bondi boost thermal spray!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Excellent, lightweight heat protection that smells great. Since my hair is fine, most products weigh it down, however this one is ideal. does not make my hair look oily or weighed down. doesn't also make my hair too stiff gifted bye Dae hair

It makes my hair feel sticky and dry. I paid for it so I don't want to throw it out but seeing this on my vanity irritates me now.

It also smells absolutely delicious. I love that it has heat protection and that it doesn't leave my hair sticky, greasy or hard but still very naturally looking. The only thing is that I have to use a lot of it for my long, fine hair. It says to mist in sections and you really have to do that to see results. reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: recently tried the Dae Hair Agave Dry Heat & Hold Styling Mist, hoping to add volume and texture to my fine, thin hair. The spray delivered on the texture front, giving my hair more body and definition. I appreciated the exclusion of harmful ingredients and the inclusion of natural oils and extracts in the formula. However, I encountered a couple of issues that prevented me from fully enjoying the product. The mist had a drying effect, making my hair feel stiff and brittle. It also became unusually stiff and difficult to manage when exposed to rain. Additionally, the fragrance, while pleasant, was too strong for my preference and occasionally gave me a slight stomachache. In conclusion, the styling mist does provide texture and visually appealing results, but the drying effect, stiffness in moisture, and heavy fragrance were downsides for me. Please note that I received this product complimentary from deahair in exchange for my honest review.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, blonde, medium length hair and most products like this tend to weigh my hair down or make it feel sticky and crunchy. I didn't have overly high hopes for this, to be honest, but I'm honestly shocked by how much I like it. I've found myself reaching for it on an everyday basis before I curl my hair because it actually does help hold my hairstyle without making my hair feel stiff and disgusting.  First of all, the mister on this is perfect; other brands need to take note because this is exactly the kind of mister that I want my hair products to have. It's super fine so that it actually evenly gets distributed through my hair which I definitely appreciate. Also, this smells fabulous- - it's a sweet, yet zesty citrus scent and unfortunately it doesn't last very long but it smells great while it does!  I love how this somehow manages to help my hair hold a curl better but I can still brush through it to a certain degree without completely brushing the curl out and it never feels hard or crunchy. This is something that I've been reaching for every single day because it actually makes a difference in my hair styling routine. I honestly don't know how well this would work for individuals with really thick, coarse, or curly hair because it honestly might not give quite enough grit or texture since it's a pretty lightweight product but for those (like myself) with fine hair, this is awesome.  *Gifted by Daehair *I am a Sephora Community Ambassador

reviews.review_text: This product was gifted to me by DAE and here is my honest review: I recently tried the Dae Hair Agave dry heat and hold styling mist and I am thoroughly impressed! I love that it is infused with desert-derived botanicals like agave, prickly pear, and cactus flower, which not only add to the effectiveness of the product but also give it a refreshing citrus scent. The mist is easy to use, and the directions are simple to follow. I appreciated that it can be used as a light-hold hairspray, making it a versatile styling product. Overall, I would highly recommend the Dae Hair Agave dry heat and hold styling mist to anyone looking for a reliable styling mist that not only protects their hair but also leaves it looking and smelling great!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this Dae Hair agave dry heat & hold styling spray complimentary from the brand to test out for an honest review. I have been really wanting to try this product and I am very impressed! It holds my hair so well after I style it with my air wrap or curling iron. It also smells great! I would definitely recommend this product!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I've been using Dae for a while now and this heat protectant doesn't disappoint! It helps with frizziness and gives my hair a soft but sleek finish after heat styling that I often need multiple products to achieve. This was gifted by Dae.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is a great heat protectant spray. First of all, the sprayer itself works great and delivers a fine mist that makes it easy to coat all the hair. I have naturally wavy hair and like to straighten it regularly so a heat protectant is a must on my routine. I like to apply this on dry hair in sections before heat styling. It makes my hair look immediately shinier without weighing it down, and the subtle sweet and warm scent is also a plus. My hair looks healthy and soft after styling, and most importantly, is also protected. This has quickly become a favorite on my hair care routine and I highly recommend! I received this product complimentary from Dae Hair but this is my honest opinion.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Dae hair . This product made my hair so silky smooth. Shiny and smells amazing . Made it easier to brush and help with my Frizziness . This is a great product to help heat protect and help with fly aways .

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from daehair . Don't let that steer u away from my review I absolutely love this brand and this product is no different! Smells amazing just like they described a citrus summer day !! Love it i ised this before heat as a protector and after for a light hold !! It's really does add shine softness and somehow holds my hair with absolutely no crunch !! I will 100% add this into my routine

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Loved that this spray held my hair without needing a lot of product. It doesn't make my hair stuff like hairspray usually does but it holds my hair in place just like it! It's light and airy and makes me feel better about using holding products in my hair. Gifted by Dae Hair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Dae Hair. This is the styling product I didn't know I needed! It smells amazing and creates a nice hold without being sticky or crunchy. If you are a fan of the dae styling cream, you'll love this for heat use.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I received this product complimentary from Dae Hair in exchange for my honest review. After using it for a week my hair is shiner. I use it as a light hairspray too. Protects my hair from heatu2026I lightly mist every section of my hair before using flat iron. Pleasant citrus scent.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Gifted by Dae Hair this styling spray is a great product to finish off my hair when I style it using a lot of heat. I feel like it does help a bit and it has a nice clean smell so leaves my hair smelling super bomb

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Dae product ever and I am sooo happy I got to try this! First of all, the scent is amazing. Smells sweet like agave but isn't overpowering and overwhelming at all. The result I was trying to accomplish is just super smooth, minimal frizz, and obviously protecting my hair from heat damage from my various hot tools. The results were just that! My hair felt soft and not fried after styling, I noticed reduced frizz than usual, and my hair was smooth, soft, and shiny. This product definitely benefited my hair and it is my new go-to heat protectant - PLUS all the added benefits like the shiniest and smoothness! I'm in love, and now I need to try EVERYTHING from Dae! Gifted by Dae Hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This product was gifted by Dae Hair. This product smells absolutely divine! I'm used to styling products having a chemical scent but this spray smells so natural and beautiful. I have hair that gets frizzy very easily so when I used this product before straightening it helped maintain how straight I wanted my hair to be. My hair didn't get frizzy at all and stayed straight being in the heat for hours! Love this so much!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This product has a lovely summery scent. It sprays in a fine mist that applies evenly. I have fine, thin hair and this has not weighed it down any. It leaves my hair with less frizz and gives a shiny look. Gifted by Dae Hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: as usual this product, like all of their others, has the most beautiful scent! It works really nicely on my super fine hair and also my extensions. It doesn't weigh it down or add any weird stickiness! just the right amount of hold! gifted by dae

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this complimentary from Dae haircare in exchange for my honest review. This is a game changer if you have fine hair that doesn't hold a curl well. Not only is this a heat protectant but it also has hold without leaving for hair feeling greasy or crunchy. It also smells amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received this gifted by Dae. Since I've been using this heat protector, my hair has changed! I used to not use anything before applying heat and I felt that my hair was slowly changing and it felt a bit dry. Now I feel safe with Dae to apply it and also make waves or simply to dry it and make it straight. incredible!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: DAE hair gifted me their new heat protectant and it is amazinggg! It smells just as good as their other products and leaves an amazing shine. Does not feel heavy on my hair and the spray nozzle is so nice at distributing it all evenly.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: Really interesting product that combines both heat protection and hold. Super cute packaging. The spray definitely has a grapefruit scent. It made my curls last longer than they would have normally. This was gifted by Dae.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is one of the best heat protectant sprays I have ever used!! It smells likes fruit punch, and has my hair feeling so soft! It gives my hair a beautiful shine, and tames the frizz unlike anything else I have ever used!! A little bit goes a long way, and this holds my hair in place so unbelievably well! If you have dry/frizzy hair, then this is going to be perfect for you! Gifted by Dae

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I don't frequently fix my hair with heat tools but when I do I always want some protection. I have hair that gets oily easily so I loved that this was a lighter weight protectant. I also loved the spritz bottle and the yummy, exotic scent! this was gifted by Dae Hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The girl who leaves her scent behind from passing by, that's what I aim for and I feel this will amp it up because it smells so good! I love that I can use it as heat protector and also just as a soft hold product without the need for heat. I kindly received this gifted by Daw Hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The mist works really well for my fine hair. It has a lovely fruity smell that lingers. I also like how it tames my frizz on hot days. It holds up well when styling and seems to do well with the heat from my curling iron. Gifted by Daehair

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Loved this heat and hold styling mist. It worked great on wet or dry hair which I love. It protects my hair from heat which I definitely need all the time and I can use it on dry hair so before I curly my hair or want to refresh. The holds great when I use it to set my hair and my hair doesn't frizz at all in humidity. The scent is also great, not to strong and refreshing, smells like summer. This was gifted by Dae Hair!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: (gifted by dae) this is my new favorite heat protectant to use when i style my hair! the signature dae citrusy scent is to die for and makes my hair smell so yummy. i have finer hair and find that this spray doesn't weigh it down & helps build some volume too. <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This product is amazing! It provides amazing hold and shine without that crunchy feeling. and the scent!!! So good

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was so happy to receive this in exchange for an honest review and let me tell you it works. Gives me just enough hold without all the stickiness. My hair was left looking put together and so soft. I could not be happier.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, auburn hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This A styling mist that provides heat protection and controls frizz for shiny, soft hair. It's for Straight, Wavy, Curly, and Coily It's for Hair Texture: that Fine, Medium, and Thick.. I love the subtle scent, it's an ultra fine mist it's heat protection up to 450* I like that it's vegan and cruelty free .. all the good ingredients for your hair and you can also use it as a flexible hold hair spray ,but leaves hair soft  what more can you ask for

reviews.review_title: Protects my hair from heat and smells amazing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Dae products smell so incredible. This styling mist helps to protect your hair from hot styling tools. My hair is soft and the curl holds well- goodbye fried frizzy ends. I love all the natural ingredients and am happy To have found this product and ad it to my hair routine.

reviews.review_title: It's a yeah for me dog
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: First off: I was gifted this to review but this is my honest and fair opinion. I was skeptical, only because I don't typically care for how hair spray and/or heat protectant feels on my hair. I used it on my damp hair in sections during a blowout shesh and I can 100% recommend. Not only is the smell to die for, but it doesn't leave your hair sticky or ratty. My hair is shiny and looks healthier than ever (and I just bleached the sh*t out of it). I would pay real money for this product.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: ufffc I've used this styling mist on two different hairstyles my own & my partners & the results were great. The hold lasts throughout the day & I didn't seem to have issues with the humidity. It smells wonderful and leaves the hair smooth and revitalized This is something that I would recommend to a friend and use again

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Literally a dream in a bottle! My hair is dull and frizzy towards the ends and this spray makes my hair so shiny and so put together. I have a bunch of baby hairs and frizz that is now tamed and unnoticeable! I love this product and it was just want I was needing!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the entire dae hair line and this product is no exception!! It truly is a fine mist which I think helps distribute the product really well throughout your hair. I used this product before I curled my hair up for the eras tour and my curls loosened but held up pretty well by the end of the night! The scent of the product is citrusy and summery, soo good!! Attached a pic of me before the concert for proof of the curly + shiny hair goodness <3

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I am a huge fan of dae and this new heat protection and styling mist is SO good! It has the perfect fresh & summery scent to it - I applied generously throughout my hair before curling it and love that it is helping protect my hair without weighing it down!
